page.title: 07Pontins Holiday Camp(2)
page.content:
There are many facilities in addition to that of the nearby beach. The camp has a games room, shop and swimming pool, a table tennis area, an adventure playgrouund, a first aide centre, a trampoline, crazy golf,a babies' swimming pool, a launderette, and a dining room.
There are also organized trips to other attractions nearby, such as the strawberry farm.
There are four hundred chalets divided into eight blocks of chalets named after Jersey places and they are called Gorey, Bouley, Grosnez, St. Aubins, St.Brelade, Portlet, Corbiere and Sorel.
